data.title: Bethune-Cookman University Athletics
data.meta_description: Korey Harris (48) Defensive Line  - 2014 – Sophomore Season Played in all 12 games for the Wildcats in his first season with the program after transferring
data.text:
2014 – Sophomore Season

Played in all 12 games for the Wildcats in his first season with the program after transferring from West Virginia… Collected 10 tackles on the campaign, including six by way of solo performance… Added three tackles for loss with two quarterback sacks… Also recovered a fumble and pressured the quarterback on three occasions… Posted a quarterback sack with a loss of four yards in the home-opening victory over Grambling State… Posted a season-high two primary stops, including one tackle for loss, at UCF in Orlando… Tallied a pair of tackles (one solo), assisting on a quarterback sack, while pressuring the quarterback twice in the MEAC-opening win over Delaware State at home in Daytona Beach… Pulled down a season-high three tackles (two assisted), including an assist on a quarterback sack while registering a fumble recovery at Savannah State… Had one assisted tackle in an ESPNU Thursday night televised contest at Hampton… Recorded a primary stop with a quarterback hurry in the win over Florida A&M in the annual Florida Blue Florida Classic in Orlando…

At West Virginia

Enrolled at West Virginia in 2012… Played 11 games for the Mountaineers as a true freshman… Collected four tackles as a reserve defensive lineman... Redshirted during the 2013 campaign to retain his eligibility…

Bartram Trail HS

Prepped at Bartram Trail High in Jacksonville, Florida… Two-year starter for head coach Darrell Sutherland… Finished career with a 19-6 record, including a 12-2 mark in 2011, advancing to the Florida 6A state semifinals… Recorded 53 tackles (36 solo, 17 assisted) in 2011, along with 4.5 sacks and one pass breakup… Made a season-high 10 tackles against Pace and had at least five tackles in six different games… Finished 2010 with 45 tackles (34 solo, 11 assisted) and finished with eight sacks, including three sacks against Bishop Kenny to go with a season-high eight tackles… Two-time member of The St. Augustine Record All-County squad, while also earning honorable mention honors on the 2011 Florida Times-Union All-First Coast team… Three-star prospect according to Rivals.com and ESPN.com… Also offered by Cincinnati, NC State and Western Michigan…
